short_description: Billed consumption in a given date range for all customers.
long_description: Shows billed consumption in a given date range based on either end reading date or bill date for all customers. Report only shows consumption associated with posted bills; consumption related to unposted bills is not included.

short_description: CROA parcel metered consumption for a selected date range.
long_description: All CROA parcel metered consumption for a selected date range based on end reading. Summary shows the sum of consumption for all meters. Detail shows consumption of each meter individually. NOTE: The Consumption From/To fields do not need to be filled in if restrictions on returned records are not necessary, and the report will show all records. If a value is entered only in the Consumption From field, the report will include results greater than and equal to the entry. If a value is entered only in the Consumption To field, the report will show results that are less than and equal to the entry. They may also both be used, and everything in between and including the inputted values will be returned on the report.

short_description: Lists unposted meter reads with characteristics outside of set thresholds.
long_description: Lists unposted meter reads with characteristics outside of set thresholds. Available in Route/Book/Stop, Account Number, or Address order. Includes a column to record a new, updated reading. NOTE: "High Variance" or "Low Variance" must be selected from the "Warning" dropdown list before entering the variance percentage.

short_description: Metered consumption for a selected date range.
long_description:
All metered consumption for a selected date range based on end reading. Summary shows the sum of consumption for all meters. Detail shows consumption of each meter individually.

NOTE: The Consumption From/To fields do not need to be filled in if restrictions on returned records are not necessary, and the report will show all records. If a value is entered only in the Consumption From field, the report will include results greater than and equal to the entry. If a value is entered only in the Consumption To field, the report will show results that are less than and equal to the entry. They may also both be used, and everything in between and including the inputted values will be returned on the report.

short_description: Lists meters whose readings fall above or below the variance thresholds
long_description: Lists meters whose readings fall above or below the variance thresholds. Values entered represent the percent difference between current unposted read with the last posted read. High Variance Threshold can be entered as any positive whole number. Low variance threshold may be entered as a number between 0-99.

long_description: All IVR payments within a selected date range. Summary includes sections showing payments by Payment Date, by Billing Type, and by Payment Type (Billing Type per Payment Type). Detail displays payments per customer, grouped and ordered by Payment Date.

short_description: Online credit card payment batches processed within a given date range.
long_description: Shows online credit card payment batches processed within the given date range. "Summary" shows amounts grouped by billing type and sorted by batch ID. "Deposits" shows a total amount grouped by batch ID. "Detail" shows each customer's deposit amount, fee amount, and total payment, sorted by batch ID and customer account number.

long_description: Shows non-deposit payments that are not currently applied to a bill on a customer account. Summary shows the sum of all overpayments by billing type. Detail shows each customer with an overpayment and can be grouped by billing type if desired

long_description: Alternate view of Payment Reconciliation Batches

long_description: All payments in a specified date range grouped by billing type. Summary shows payment amounts by account type, then account category, then billing type. Detail displays payments for each customer grouped by account type, then account category, then billing type.

short_description: Payments in a selected date range.

short_description: Payments within a selected date range grouped by payment type.
long_description: All payments within a selected date range grouped by payment type. Summary shows payments by payment type and billing type. Detail lists individual payments by payment type ordered by date then account number.

long_description: All payments within a selected date range grouped by payment type. Summary shows payments by payment type and billing type. Detail lists individual payments by payment type ordered by date then account number. Includes a deposits section post-summary.

short_description: Returned payments within a date range.
long_description: Shows returned payments within a selected date range. Also displays any returned payment fees applied to customers. Bill Date signifies the day the payment was returned in the system and corresponding debits created.

long_description: Payments that have not been applied or that are applied to an unposted bill.
